channel.title: gnomejournal on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in gnomejournal on Paul Cutler

item.title: GNOME Journal Needs You!
item.description: GNOME Journal, the online magazine dedicated to everything surrounding the GNOME Desktop, needs your help! We haven’t published an edition of the GNOME Journal since December 2007, and work is ramping up to get a new edition published. What kind of help do we need? I’m glad you asked! It might not be what you think. We need: CSS / HTML hackers – We are migrating GNOME Journal from it’s current CMS to WordPress, and we have some final touches that need to be fixed on our WordPress theme, as well as the look and feel of the archives section.
